relproducts.title: Rimini Sand - Roller Blind
relproducts.description: Rimini sand's pale yellow-cream hue is a pretty, uplifting addition to any window. Its light translucency means that plenty of light penetrates it, even when closed, so you'll never be lacking in sunshine. Pair sand with navy blues and light-coloured woods for a modern look with a unique twist, or with browns, greens, and golds for something classic and luxurious. Either of these would be the perfect look for the living room or dining room in a contemporary, stylish home.

relproducts.title: Stirlo Stone Beige
relproducts.description: Stirlo stone beige plain roller blind the stirlo range boast a fantastic range of dim-out privacy fabrics to compliment any room. The fabric is composed of 100% polyester and is rolled around a strong, rust free aluminium tube. The blind is supplied with a premium control mechanism with white chain used as standard, or a nickel metal chain can be chosen above to upgrade. Supplied with the blinds are installation instructions and universal brackets suitable for top, side and face fixing.

relproducts.title: Calaf Beige Vertical Blind
relproducts.description: Here we have a pale beige vertical blind, its light enough in colour to be subtle at the window but still injects some colour into a design scheme. The pattern on the calaf fabric is inspired by the natural curved shape of a leaf and includes a soft sheen too. This blind w here we have a pale beige vertical blind, its light enough in colour to be subtle at the window but still injects some colour into a design scheme.

relproducts.title: Welwyn Biscuit Vertical Blind
relproducts.description: We especially like this welwyn biscuit vertical blind, it gives us a warm fuzzy feeling inside. We think its the sunny neutral shade that does it. You can share their fuzzy feeling in any room you like by adding this blind. Itll look fab anywhere, even a bathroom. relproducts.title: Valencia Simplicity Beige Vertical Blind
relproducts.description: This valenica simplicity vertical blind is light beige, just like an extremely milky coffee. Some might say buff or ecru but whatever you call it, it's a nice neutral colour that adds just enough tone to your window. relproducts.title: Verona Prime 25mm Titanium Perfect Fit Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: Their range of verona 25mm perfect fit aluminium venetian blinds blend simplicity with functionality, and are perfect for the office - home or away. A stylish grey tone, this titanium perfect fit venetian blind adds a bold grey shade to your home. Match with other grey tones for a modern style, or mix with wood accessories for a chic finished look. Perfect fit blinds are designed for use with a upvc door and window as they are drill, and screw-free.

relproducts.title: Honey Perfect Fit Sunwood
relproducts.description: This gorgeous perfect fit sunwood blind comes in a range of quality fabrics - here we have it in honey. In addition, this blind includes controls to the left, no frame and no brackets (which are all options).

relproducts.title: Honey Perfect Fit
relproducts.description: Amid brown shade, thehoney oak 25mm perfect fit blindboasts elegance in any window. Using a patented and extremely easy tool-less clip on system, the perfect fit wooden blinds are a child-safe option, and are both drill and screw free - giving peace of mind that your manufacturers warranty on your windows and doors is not affected. Hand crafted in yorkshire, the perfect fit frame is made from aluminium, with uv-treated plastic corners and, of course, the blind is made from real basswood - giving extremely good thermal benefits to any room as wood is a natural insulator.

relproducts.title: Mouse Honeycomb Dimout Perfect Fit
relproducts.description: Grey is a popular colour and that wont change anytime soon. The mouse honeycomb dimout perfect fit blind will enhance any room its in with its gentle grey colour. If youre after a dimout perfect fit blind and grey is your colour, this blind is for you. Struggling to cover your french doors? Pleated perfect fit blinds are a great way to shade each pane, and provide style and privacy at the same time.

relproducts.title: Lime Honeycomb Dimout Perfect Fit
relproducts.description: The lime honeycomb dimout perfect fit offers a bolder, more vibrant alternative to their other dimout perfect fit options. Its bright citrus tone will make it a real talking point in your home, while the honeycomb pleating offers thermal and soundproofing benefits. Struggling to cover your french doors? Pleated perfect fit blinds are a great way to shade each pane, and provide style and privacy at the same time.

relproducts.title: Dawn Honeycomb Dimout Perfect Fit
relproducts.description: The gentle pink of the dawn honeycomb dimout perfect fit will not fail to add some personality to your windows. relproducts.title: Ash Honeycomb Dimout Perfect Fit
relproducts.description: The ash honeycomb perfect fit blind will bring some earthy tones to your home with its subtle caramel colour. relproducts.title: Infusion Asc Beige Perfect Fit
relproducts.description: Infusion asc beige perfect fit pleated blind. Part of their infusion asc range, where advanced solar control (asc) creates a perfect solution for any room, reducing the sun's glare whilst also increasing your energy efficiency. The asc refers to a reflective backing on the material which helps improve the energy efficiency of the blind by reflecting the heat out in the summer and retaining heat in the winter.
